title: The new commercials look like youtube videos from 2009
body:
If they really want to get new players, they need to make the game look interesting. Hell, even the same concept-- giving people the attributes/weapons of the champions they're playing-- would work well fully animated. In fact,  it already has:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PX_IQkeXq9g 

But please, please stop these god-awful live action commercials. They look just like that canceled, god-awful Cartoon Network show Level Up from a few years back when they thought live action should be included on a network with such a title:
Here's a clip of that and one of the new ads, for comparison:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yb7Zvcf0Oks

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S86guMGBKrU 

If this keeps up, not only will there _not_ be new players joining, but the lack of new players coupled with the insane balancing decisions that anyone who's been working on a game for ten years has no excuse to be making will truly be the death of League of Legends.
